ygData.subject: RE: divine aura and gating?
ygData.msgSnippet: btw-  one of the best things you can learn to do is KEEP Divine Aura as a permenant spell in your bag of tricks....its is a life saver.  Use it to stop em like
ygData.messageBody:
btw- one of the best things you can learn to do is KEEP Divine Aura as a
permenant spell in your bag of tricks....its is a life saver. Use it to
stop em like I said, or to zone....and it casts for me like 9/10 times even
THROUGH heavy hitting.....

Only problem: IT STILL STUNS

-----Original Message-----
From: Rose [mailto:rliu@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 4:08 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] divine aura and gating?


From: "Rose" <rliu@...>

Can this be done? Can u cast divine aura and then gate? I have yet to try
because I'm always too busy running when I feel the need to cast divine
aura...and end up dying anyway >:(

-Imogen
